audio prebuilt module usage guide

Brief:          This module contains third_party codec library for audio middleware implementation.
Usage:          GCC: Include the module with "include $(SOURCE_DIR)/middleware/MTK/audio/module.mk" in your GCC project Makefile.
                KEIL: No support.
                IAR: No support.
Dependency:     This module has the dependency with audio module. Please also make sure to include audio module.
Notice:         none.
Relative doc:   none.
Example project:none.
